column2:
"No, that was amazing!
Your moves have been burned into my mind.
I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess with an enemy like that, it's best
to quickly find the main unit and then focus
your attacks on that."

"I'm gonna remember that for future use.
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、ああいう相手には
本体見つけ出して集中攻撃だな！"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
